title: WCD Kodagu Recruitment 2025 - Apply Online for 215 Anganwadi Worker & Helper Posts
description: The Women and Child Development Department, Kodagu (WCD Kodagu) has officially released the notification to fill the vacancies of 215 Anganwadi Worker and Helper Posts. Interested and eligibile candidates can use this opportunity to apply for these posts before the last date of application. Candidates who have completed their 10th and 12th can apply for the WCD Kodagu Recruitment 2025. The interested applicants can apply in online mode. Here we have mentioned the education details, age limit,...
